name: Gravity Smash (Demo)
description:
This is a demo. The game is in development and will be available later on Steam.

Gravity Smash is a survival gravity-controlled rogue-lite in which you have to survive randomly generated waves of heart craving monsters. Change the center of gravity to get your weapon in orbit and smash all the monsters.

This demo features a 5+ minute run of 8 waves with increasing difficulty.  The power-ups are intentionally left undocumented to see if you can guess what they do.

Any feedback is deeply appreciated :) You can leave a comment below or contact me on Twitter @i208iN

Note: Beware the bombs !
